issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: At least some user-api services answer requests even while stopped

comments.body: [~gholms], did you check to ensure the service was in the stopped state before describing regions?
Yes.  You can try it yourself on 10.111.1.11 if you would like.
UFS services enabled check is fixed, services that are STOPPED will now redirect as expected to an enabled service.

[~kgill]
Couple things here:
# The command now has a new name as part of new admin tools work, {{euserv-modify-service}}
# the {{-s}} is the same as the {{-t}} so state would be stop or start (amongst other options)

here is an example describing services in the new way, as well as modifying. Here I stop identity service, verify it is stopped then start it again and see that it is again enabled.
{code}
[root@g-05-02 ~]# euserv-describe-services --region localhost
SERVICE  autoscaling           API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.autoscaling     enabled
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend    eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  bootstrap             bootstrap        10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  cloudformation        API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.cloudformation  enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatch            API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.cloudwatch      enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend     eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  cluster               one              one-cc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  cluster               two              two-cc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  compute               API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.compute         enabled
SERVICE  dns                   API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.dns             enabled
SERVICE  euare                 API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.euare           enabled
SERVICE  eucalyptus            eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  identity              API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.identity        enabled
SERVICE  imaging               API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.imaging         enabled
SERVICE  imagingbackend        eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  jetty                 eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancing         API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.loadbalancing   enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancingbackend  eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  notifications         eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  objectstorage         API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.objectstorage   enabled
SERVICE  pollednotifications   eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  reporting             bootstrap        10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  simpleworkflow        API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.simpleworkflow  enabled
SERVICE  storage               one              one-sc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  storage               two              two-sc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  tokens                API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.tokens          enabled
SERVICE  user-api              API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62                 enabled
SERVICE  walrusbackend         walrus           walrus                          enabled

[root@g-05-02 ~]# euserv-modify-service -s stop API_10.111.1.62.identity

[root@g-05-02 ~]# euserv-describe-services --region localhost
SERVICE  autoscaling           API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.autoscaling     enabled
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend    eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  bootstrap             bootstrap        10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  cloudformation        API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.cloudformation  enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatch            API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.cloudwatch      enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend     eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  cluster               one              one-cc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  cluster               two              two-cc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  compute               API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.compute         enabled
SERVICE  dns                   API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.dns             enabled
SERVICE  euare                 API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.euare           enabled
SERVICE  eucalyptus            eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  identity              API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.identity        stopped
SERVICE  imaging               API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.imaging         enabled
SERVICE  imagingbackend        eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  jetty                 eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancing         API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.loadbalancing   enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancingbackend  eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  notifications         eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  objectstorage         API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.objectstorage   enabled
SERVICE  pollednotifications   eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  reporting             bootstrap        10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  simpleworkflow        API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.simpleworkflow  enabled
SERVICE  storage               one              one-sc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  storage               two              two-sc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  tokens                API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.tokens          enabled
SERVICE  user-api              API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62                 enabled
SERVICE  walrusbackend         walrus           walrus                          enabled

[root@g-05-02 ~]# euserv-modify-service -s start API_10.111.1.62.identity

[root@g-05-02 ~]# euserv-describe-services --region localhost
SERVICE  autoscaling           API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.autoscaling     enabled
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend    eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  bootstrap             bootstrap        10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  cloudformation        API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.cloudformation  enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatch            API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.cloudwatch      enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend     eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  cluster               one              one-cc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  cluster               two              two-cc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  compute               API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.compute         enabled
SERVICE  dns                   API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.dns             enabled
SERVICE  euare                 API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.euare           enabled
SERVICE  eucalyptus            eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  identity              API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.identity        enabled
SERVICE  imaging               API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.imaging         enabled
SERVICE  imagingbackend        eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  jetty                 eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancing         API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.loadbalancing   enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancingbackend  eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  notifications         eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  objectstorage         API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.objectstorage   enabled
SERVICE  pollednotifications   eucalyptus       10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  reporting             bootstrap        10.111.1.174                    enabled
SERVICE  simpleworkflow        API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.simpleworkflow  enabled
SERVICE  storage               one              one-sc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  storage               two              two-sc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  tokens                API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62.tokens          enabled
SERVICE  user-api              API_10.111.1.62  API_10.111.1.62                 enabled
SERVICE  walrusbackend         walrus           walrus                          enabled
{code}

[~kgill], to verify this fix is is necessary to have multiple UFS hosts. You would need to pass '--region localhost' with each command or otherwise configure the endpoint to use (in recent clouds the endpoint is configured in eucarc for the cloud administrator)

[~kgill], you would need to use credentials for a user permitted to modify services, such as the cloud administrator. To verify the access key being used is the one you expect you can run with the --debug option.

Fix Verified.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.2.0
Release     : 0.0.23996.695.20151007gitbf619d4.el6

On a setup with 2 UFS, after stopping the compute service of one, performing request to that UFS redirects to an enabled compute service.

Stop 1 of the computer services for the cloud:
{code}
[root@g-05-07 ~]# euserv-modify-service -s stop API_10.111.5.163.compute
[root@g-05-07 ~]# euserv-describe-services --region localhost
...
SERVICE  compute               API_10.111.5.163  API_10.111.5.163.compute         stopped
SERVICE  compute               API_10.111.5.167  API_10.111.5.167.compute         enabled
...
{code}

Debug output showing that the request to  {{http://10.111.5.163:8773/services/compute}} was redirected to {{http://10.111.5.167:8773/services/compute}}

You can see the endpoint that responded and that a redirect occurred. {{EC2 redirecting to http://10.111.5.167:8773/services/compute (4 redirect(s) remaining)}}
{code}
[root@g-05-07 ~]# euca-describe-images -U http://10.111.5.163:8773/services/compute --debug
